We are very proud for being able to present you five modules for **Liquid Web** and **Storm On Demand**!
In cooperation with Liquid Web we have created some really good modules for WHMCS which you can now use for **FREE**!

Allow your customers to order Liquid Web Storm Servers and Storm On Demand Storm Servers directly from your WHMCS and conveniently manage them from the client area:

✓ [Liquid Web For WHMCS](http://www.modulesgarden.com/products/whmcs/liquid_web/features)  
✓ [Storm On Demand For WHMCS](http://www.modulesgarden.com/products/whmcs/storm_on_demand/features)


Allow your customers to order Liquid Web Load Balancers and Storm On Demand Load Balancers directly from your WHMCS and conveniently manage them from the client area:

✓ [Liquid Web Load Balancer For WHMCS](http://www.modulesgarden.com/products/whmcs/liquid_web_load_balancer/features)  
✓ [Storm On Demand Load Balancer For WHMCS](http://www.modulesgarden.com/products/whmcs/storm_on_demand_load_balancer/features)


Charge your customers based on the server resources used by them in modules Liquid Web For WHMCS, Storm On Demand For WHMCS, Liquid Web Load Balancer For WHMCS and Storm On Demand Load Balancer For WHMCS. Automatically generate and deliver invoices directly to your customers.

✓ [Storm Servers Billing For WHMCS](http://www.modulesgarden.com/products/whmcs/storm_servers_billing/features)


Check also our DNS Manager For WHMCS which supports Storm On Demand:

✓ [DNS Manager For WHMCS](http://www.modulesgarden.com/products/whmcs/dns_manager/features)
